scripts.format: bun run --cwd packages/quackgraph format && bun run --cwd packages/agent format
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && bun run --cwd packages/quackgraph clean && bun run --cwd packages/agent clean
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit && bun run --cwd packages/agent typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/quackgraph typecheck
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd packages/quackgraph lint && bun run --cwd packages/agent lint
scripts.check: bun run typecheck && bun run lint
scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run build:agent
